alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Weber... eastern Box Elder and northeastern Davis Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 458 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Marriott-Slaterville, or near Ogden, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Farmington, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, Perry, Willard, Marriott-Slaterville, Uintah and Weber State University. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 326 and 359. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
